cleaned_text: Restart and restore with our detoxifying caffeine free tea. A blend of Rooibos, Ginger, Rose petals, Cardamom, Ahwanandha, Camomile, Turmeric, Aloe vera powder & Juniper berries. Our mega popular Organic Detox will help cleanse your system thanks to its powerful antioxidants. You'll love its citrusy lemongrass punch and smooth herbal notes. Now all you have to do is find a reason to detox!
